title: Re: Hey I got a keen related question.
content:

As for the whole CGA EGA thing -- I don't understand the different between the two. You'll have to ask someone with my knowledge on the subject.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

title: Re: Hey I got a keen related question.
content:
Those CGA-patched Keen: Vorticons games aren't really CGA, by the way -- they're just patched to have a palette similar to CGA hires palette 1 (incidentally, I'd like to register my annoyance that programmers kept using palette 1 back in those days; it's an EYESORE). They don't use the (slower) CGA draw routines or anything.

I'm pretty sure Keen 6 v1.5 will Just Run in CGA on certain IBM EGA cards that had a CGA mode selectable via jumper (they did some sort of palette clamping).

title: Re: A new patch
content:
Hey I just made a new patch for keen dreams.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

It updates Version 1.93 REV 1 to the Registered Version.

So now every one who bought the 1993 kdreams can now

have the kdreams from 1991.

Now to email this to Litude........

title: Re: A new patch
content:
I'm not sure whether this patch should be ditributed because fact is that I'm not sure whether the 1.92 & 1.93 versions of Keen Dreams are registered ones or not.

Not in a single place in the file is anything said about it being shareware, registered or commercial. The other version, on the other hand clearly states that it is a commercial product.

If the patch would be released then anyone could get their hands on the registered version, as a download link for the 1.93 version of Keen Dreams is available from here.

Of course these things should be decided by the admins.

title: Re: A new patch
content:
Well 1.93 rev 1 is the version of keen dreams that came with

id anthology so wouldnt that mean 1.93 is not shareware?

I dont know what version softdisk sells now but 1.93 seems

to be the newest and the patch is from the original kdreams

7/10/1991 before softdisk changed everything.

Looking at the KDREAMS.AUD file in 1.93 they never changed it

from 7/10/1991.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

This patch cant update 1.92 or the shareware versions that

are just the same but the exe is different.

title: Re: A new patch
content:
Well that pretty much explains it, the only thing I'm wondering about is why the version 1.93 didn't have some of the stuff that were only in the registered version and not in the shareware version.

But if that is the version in the id Anthology, that must mean it is actually registered. Patch can be downloaded from [url=http://keen.sitesled.com/files/official/patches/kdreamsr.exe]here[/url]!
